item.title: Google foo.bar
item.description: Once in the evening, Iâ€™ve been helped Google to save Bunny Planet. My friend from India told me that forest pythons are extremely dangerous. He said: Nick, you a good man, but your bear fighting skills that you developed during childhood in Russia will barely help you if you will meet such a big snake as a python in wood. So, I was looking for some docs about interaction with pythons: tips from masters, evidence of survivals.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello World! My name is Nick Kapliev. I am a Software Engineer. I know how things work, how to fix them, and how to build better ones. Contacts: nkapliev@gmail.com github.com/nkapliev twitter.com/nkapliev Or everywhere else by username nkapliev.
